message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I appreciate your enthusiasm, but $100 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. I'd be happy to take it off your hands for $85. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $95. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product. Let me know what you think!
